sections.heading: from taxation.The real property of a land bank and the land bank's income and operations are exempt from all taxation by the state or any political subdivision thereof

sections.text:
18-3409.Exemption from taxation.

The real property of a land bank and the land bank's income and operations are exempt from all taxation by the state or any political subdivision thereof.

SourceLaws 2013, LB97, § 9;R.S.Supp.,2018, § 19-5209;Laws 2020, LB424, § 9.
